alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 07 at 7:05PM MST until March 08 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle and low visibility in dense fog expected. Ice accumulations of a light glaze possible. * WHERE...South Laramie Range and much of Laramie County in southeast Wyoming including Cheyenne and the Interstate 80 corridor from Laramie to Pine Bluffs. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and low visibility under one-quarter mile at times. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
